snippet.title: The Inheritance Trailer
snippet.description:
Having learned of the Courier's exploits, a dying man contacts the player in hopes of employing him/her to deliver a mysterious package.  V

Upon accepting the job, the Courier will soon find himself/herself making unwilling allies and dangerous enemies, all jockeying to claim the same prize.

The Inheritance is a compact, lore-friendly quest mod for Fallout: New Vegas, designed to offer new avenues to experience combat and role-playing for high-level characters.
